description.translate: Resounding as the most powerful of songs, that is victory.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Dré\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Résonnante comme le plus puissant\"}","{\"text\":\"§7des chants, telle est la victoire.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Resounding as the most powerful\"}","{\"text\":\"§7of songs, that is victory.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7HER§a2 §7LUC§a1\"}"]}}
